las-geoh5
=========

Import/Export LAS files to/from geoh5 format.

This package allows for import and export of LAS files to and from a drillhole group.
There is a module each for import and export operations.  Each of these includes a driver
and a ui.json that parameterizes the driver and renders a UI for use within `Geoscience ANALYST Pro <https://mirageoscience.com/mining-industry-software/geoscience-analyst-pro/>`_.

Installation
^^^^^^^^^^^^
**las-geoh5** is currently written for Python 3.10 or higher.

Install **las-geoh5** from PyPI::

    $ pip install las-geoh5

All the content can be found on the github_ repository.

and services.
